***I mainly play as 'SURVIVOR', my review will be mostly based on that.***

I recommend this game because it's fun in the short and long term, has a huge playerbase, has a unique playstyle/game genre, and the devs keep it neat and updated frequently. 

PROs:
-Different, unique game compared to most other games out there.
-Easy to learn, hard to master (you have a lot of fun while/after you learn; have a fun challenge if you want to master it as well).
-Have fun with friends as well as with random strangers.
-There are good challenges/quests/events.
-Games are kind of short, so if you got bad luck and lost you can move on to the next game rather quickly.
-There are many playstyles to choose from in the form of skills/perks.

CONs:
-The ranking system needs tweaking, doesn't reflect accurately your progress.
-At low ranks your team will make very poor decisions, which can be frustrating.

作为一个460小时的小佬，这游戏给人感觉还不错，非常值得玩，血点和裂片机制让这个游戏寿命更长，再退出不断的dlc，让这个游戏肝下去的乐趣，希望再优化下他的匹配问题，我这460个小时基本上一半都在排队，排到了还有可能蹦，虽然现在比以前优化不少，但还是很慢，而且它的段位匹配极其离谱，16段能匹配到红段的，还有匹配到红段车队的，打到我屎都拉不出来，希望多优化下匹配.
A

- UPDATE: -

They added a matchmaking system that *roughly* works, at least 10x better than what they had before, and they are making quite a few more overdue but fantastic changes to game balance. It still takes by my guess about 50 hours before you have access to enough content to mix and match in a way that makes it fun, and a lot of the best stuff is going to cost you more as DLCs you can't unlock with play time alone. Even still, the game has become far more fun and the future looks bright. Enough to warrant a cautious, hesitant recommendation.

- OLD REVIEW: -

Characters and in-game stats progress significantly but it takes an insane amount of time to get there and don't count on any sort of matchmaking to keep people who have spent weeks grinding from being placed against you. I'm sure this game is great fun after you play ~20 hours and get your characters leveled up, but this is nothing but a chore until you do.

I don't know where/when the fad started to have heavy RPG-style character progressions without any real partition between people who are max level and people who just bought it yesterday, but it blows. Please stop doing this, devs.

this game is absolute garbage. not only is the learning curve absolutely terrible, but the recent updates to try to "crack down on toxicity" by censoring chat is absolutely terrible. there should be an option to toggle censored words. not only that but the game is not enjoyable if you get tunnelled right off the bat, camped for the entire round, and lose over 6 to 7 full ranks because people refuse to help in a TEAM GAME.

Final opinion: DO NOT GET THIS GAME.

My favourite game to play other games during matchmaking times.

The game's fun, yeah.

People can act like little shits in this game, but if you keep a clear head you can have some pretty goofy moments between being axe murdered/axe murdering someone else. 

The appeal: as survivor, you get the thrill of being hunted like in a single player horror game - but by someone intelligent instead of an AI. As killer, you get the thrill of the chase from hunting down other players, which can be pretty potent if you've never felt that before.
